ComicInfo.Summary:
Various short satires of pop culture.
A look at the Colbert Report tv show.
A juggler keeps adding increasingly dangerous items to his act until he chokes on an apple and the whole mess comes down on him.
Things you might do during the Christmas season that show you're a jerk.
Questions about the progress of the war.
Phony ad for NEW Blose QuiteDiscomforting 3 Acoustic Noise-Cancelling Headphones.
Goofy ways to pump up interest in the election by using television show gimmicks.
Mostly parents acting badly.
Monroe needs a tutor and the family finds a good one. Monroe actually passes a test but the tutor leaves due to nonpayment.
The White Spy consistently escapes bombardment by the Black Spy and eventually drops a bomb himself.
Monetary, drug and criminal sports scandals.
Catalog of ugly clothes and stupid gifts.

Spy; A MAD Look At Sports Scandals; Not So Hot Topic Catalog; Drawn-Out Dramas
